attributes.name: American Express One AP Statement Credit
attributes.conditions: High-spend benefit: Must spend $250,000 on card in calendar year to unlock $2,400 in One AP credits for following year. Credits apply to One AP platform fees, transaction fees, and taxes. Automatic enrollment.
details: Unlock up to $2,400 in statement credits for use in the next calendar year on American Express One AP® monthly fees¹ after you spend $250,000 on eligible purchases on the Business Platinum Card in this calendar year.² Statement credits will be applied to your monthly bill charged to the Card for our accounts payable solution, One AP.‡
¹Monthly fees include an auto-renewing platform access fee, transaction fees based on One AP usage, and applicable taxes.
²Statement credits valid from January 1 through December 31 of the calendar year after the calendar year in which you spend $250,000 on eligible purchases on the Business Platinum Card.
